summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GuessIt Football Prediction Platform clone. All major backend API endpoints functional (13/14 tests passed - 92.9% success rate). Frontend UI components fully operational with proper routing, responsive design, and interactive elements working correctly.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Single timeout during testing - likely due to placeholder FOOTBALL_API_KEY
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Expected behavior per agent context note - placeholder API key causes football data issues

passed_tests: Backend health endpoint: GET /api/health returns 200
Backend root endpoint: GET /api/ returns 200
Backend auth register: POST /api/auth/register works with proper fields
Backend auth login: POST /api/auth/login works with registered user
Backend auth login validation: Returns 401 for invalid credentials
Backend auth me: GET /api/auth/me properly requires authentication (401)
Backend auth logout: POST /api/auth/logout returns 200
Backend predictions protection: POST /api/predictions requires auth (401)
Backend predictions me: GET /api/predictions/me requires auth (401)
Backend football matches: GET /api/football/matches returns 200
Backend football competitions: GET /api/football/competitions returns 200
Backend football today: GET /api/football/matches/today returns 200
Frontend header: GuessIT logo, search icon, theme toggle, Login and Register buttons visible
Frontend hero banner: Promo carousel with 'Track Your Stats!' heading and CTA button
Frontend tabs section: Top Matches, Popular, Top Live, Soon tabs with icons
Frontend league filters: All Matches, Live, UCL, Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Ligue 1
Frontend view toggle: Grid/List view toggle buttons functional
Frontend theme toggle: Dark/Light mode switching works
Frontend login page: Loads at /login route with proper form elements
Frontend register page: Loads at /register route with email, password, confirm password fields
Frontend search functionality: Search opens, accepts input, shows dropdown results
Frontend responsive design: Clean dark UI with proper branding and layout
Frontend live updates: WebSocket connection indicator shows 'Live updates active'
